Hi everyone! I've posted the feedback about the pitfall we stumbled upon in our application, which is a semver hazard in proc-macro/trait symbols ambiguity.
I posted it to the users forum. However, I would like the language team to take a look at this. There was a suggestion to move that discussion to the internals forum, though I am not sure. Does in make sense to continue the discussion in the users forum there? Not sure I really have the power to do this, but it is probably the domain of @nikomatsakis, @Josh Triplett, sorry for ping guys, I hope I don't break the rules.

One thing that comes to mind would be that maybe one could make a semver-major update to the proc macro crates to rename it to something really ugly, then rename-export it under the nice name only from the library crate.
